attributes.action: Bring in legislation to protect ANY symbol of BRITISH VALUES
attributes.additional_details:
Now, more than ever, people must be educated about British History. One aspect is the sacrifice made in blood and treasure which helped other parts of the world.

British people are becoming very angry at the freedom given to those who live in the UK which they appear to hate. The FALLEN deserve to be remembered and their sacrifice respected.
attributes.background: Make it clear to all those living in the UK and enjoying the benefits and the results of sacrifices made by our FALLEN that they must respect those symbols of BRITISH VALUES for which the FALLEN made their sacrifice.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want certain symbols to be protected, but we're not sure what symbols or how you want these to be protected.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
